scripts.dev:as: npm run redis && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 REGION=AS npm run dev
scripts.dev:us: npm run redis && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 REGION=US npm run dev
scripts.dev:eu: npm run redis && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3002 REGION=EU npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run redis && npx ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.redis: docker rm -f redis-server && docker run --name redis-server -p 6379:6379 -d redis
